@RanaAyyub And why the f would you tax wealth? Wealth rises and drops as per stock price of holdings. It's the same as taxing commoners on the current market value of their MF holdings. It's like taxing you for the market value of your house and other assets. Willing? #dumbfuck

@RanaAyyub @_sayema This is really very important and considerable.. information... 

Since the pandemic began till November 2022, billionaires in India have seen their wealth surge by 121% or ₹3,608 crore per day in real terms, Oxfam said
@RanaAyyub https://t.co/TUyrvf6ixP

@RanaAyyub Only Adani, Ambani that is  0.000014285% of 1% owns 30% of India's wealth. Not because they have merit but because they have protection/monopoly & so on. Solar Panel import duty raised from 0 to 44% to give benefit to Adani & FTA with Australia for Coal @0 duty to benefit Adani.
@RanaAyyub I was thinking rich own >60%.

@RanaAyyub Tax the Rich never works.
